## FRCWidgetWidgetErrorEvent type

Event that gets dispatched when something goes wrong in the widget.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare type FRCWidgetWidgetErrorEvent = CustomEvent<FRCWidgetErrorEventData>;
```
